testimonials-1.name: Elysa M.
testimonials-1.description: We were in Montecristi as a family, a group of 18 people, during Holy Week, and we set aside a day to take a tour with Soraya and Leonardo Tours. Despite the cloudy day, we had a wonderful time with Soraya and the staff. They are very responsible, adhere to their safety measures, the boat was in excellent condition and clean, and the food was spectacular.

testimonials-2.name: José Enrique Perez German
testimonials-2.description: You'll feel right at home with the attention of Doña Soraya. She's a local tour operator who can put together a trip in minutes based on your needs. She also has a shop with everything you might need for your trip. The tours are pet-friendly. Ask about the tour of the hill, the sandbar, or the keys.

testimonials-3.name: Angee A
testimonials-3.description: Excellent! The tour is well-organized and private. They have different locations depending on what you want to do during your stay. Highly recommended!

ExcursionesPage.section-subtitle: Choose from a variety of options to enjoy Monte Cristi at its best.

tour-1.title: Great Grossier Sandbank
tour-1.description: Dive into a hidden paradise with crystal-clear, shallow waters. Relax on the white sand and enjoy the serenity of this unique sandbank.

tour-2.title: Goat Island
tour-2.description: Explore a pristine island with turquoise beaches and a picturesque lighthouse. Ideal for a peaceful getaway and nature appreciation.

tour-3.title: Seven Brothers Islands
tour-3.description: Discover seven untouched islets, home to rich marine and bird biodiversity. Perfect for nature lovers and photography enthusiasts.

tour-4.title: Ecotourism Platform
tour-4.description: Walk through mangroves and admire the views from a wooden platform offering a unique perspective of the local ecosystem.

tour-5.title: Natural Pool
tour-5.description: Bathe in peaceful, shallow waters among the mangroves. A perfect spot to relax and connect with nature.

tour-6.title: Sport Fishing
tour-6.description: Catch sailfish, dorado, and more in one of the country's top fishing destinations, guided by local experts.

tour-7.title: Snorkeling Adventure
tour-7.description: Explore vibrant coral reefs and marine life near Goat Island. An unforgettable underwater experience for all levels.

tour-8.title: Bird Watching Tour
tour-8.description: Observe diverse bird species in their natural habitat, guided by experts who will help you identify and appreciate the local avifauna.

tour-9.title: City Tour
tour-9.description: Discover the history and culture of Montecristi with a guided tour through its monuments and landmarks.

SobreNosotros.hero-subtitle: Discover the story behind Soraya and Leonardo Tours, a family business devoted to creating unforgettable sea experiences in Montecristi.
SobreNosotros.values-subtitle: These principles guide every excursion and every interaction with our clients.
SobreNosotros.value-1-desc: Our love for the ocean drives us to share its wonders with every visitor.
SobreNosotros.value-2-desc: We implement the highest safety standards in all our excursions.
SobreNosotros.value-3-desc: We are committed to protecting the marine environment and promoting responsible practices.
SobreNosotros.start-desc-1: In 2002, Soraya and Leonardo decided to combine their love for the sea and passion for tourism to create a business offering unique excursions along the Montecristi coast.
SobreNosotros.start-desc-2: With a fleet of modern boats and a team of expert guides, we deliver experiences that blend adventure, safety, and fun.
SobreNosotros.start-subtitle-desc: Over 20 years sailing the waters of Montecristi
SobreNosotros.mission-desc-1: At Soraya and Leonardo Tours, our mission is to connect people with the beauty of the sea through authentic and memorable experiences.
SobreNosotros.mission-desc-2: We strive to offer personalized service, prioritizing safety and customer satisfaction.
SobreNosotros.philosophy-desc-1: We believe in responsible and sustainable tourism. That’s why we’re committed to protecting the marine environment and promoting practices that respect local flora and fauna.
SobreNosotros.philosophy-desc-2: Each excursion is designed to minimize environmental impact while maximizing fun and learning.
SobreNosotros.philosophy-subtitle-desc: We protect the ecosystems we visit

tour-1.title: Great Grossier Sandbank
tour-1.description: The journey begins with a boat ride through the mangroves, a thriving ecosystem full of life and natural beauty. We’ll make a brief stop at the Ecotourism Platform to take in the scenery and capture photos. Next, we head to Gran Gossier Beach, spending about 40 minutes enjoying its crystal-clear waters and soft white sand. We then sail around the majestic Morro of Montecristi to admire its impressive view from the sea and end the day at Goat Island, a paradise for relaxation.

tour-2.title: Goat Island
tour-2.description: A direct excursion to Goat Island, a natural gem located beside the Morro of Montecristi. Spend between 2 and 4 hours on its white sand beaches and turquoise waters, perfect for swimming, unwinding, or exploring its untouched shoreline.

tour-3.title: Seven Brothers Islands
tour-3.description: We depart early, no later than 7:00 AM, toward the Seven Brothers Cays archipelago. We visit three accessible islands: Tuna, Cayo Muerto, and Montechico. Each offers pristine landscapes, crystal-clear waters, and abundant marine life. The remaining cays, surrounded by rocks and coral, are admired from the boat for their natural beauty.

tour-4.title: Ecotourism Platform
tour-4.description: We set sail to explore the channels of the mangrove forest, observing its unique wildlife and vegetation. We stop at the Ecotourism Platform to enjoy panoramic views. Afterward, we navigate around the Morro of Montecristi to admire its spectacular silhouette from the sea and end the trip at Goat Island, where you can relax on its beaches and enjoy an unparalleled natural setting.

tour-5.title: Natural Pool
tour-5.description: The adventure begins with a ride through the mangroves to the Ecotourism Platform, a perfect spot to take in the landscape. From there, we venture deeper into the mangrove heart to reach the Natural Pool, an area of clear waters and golden sand with a unique texture—ideal for swimming and relaxing. The route continues around the Morro of Montecristi to appreciate its imposing presence from the sea and ends at Goat Island, where you can enjoy calm waters and natural beauty.

tour-6.title: Sport Fishing
tour-6.description: Catch sailfish, dorado, and more in one of the country's top fishing destinations, guided by local experts.

tour-7.title: Snorkeling Adventure
tour-7.description: Explore vibrant coral reefs and marine life near Goat Island. An unforgettable underwater experience for all levels.

tour-8.title: Bird Watching Tour
tour-8.description: Observe diverse bird species in their natural habitat, guided by experts who will help you identify and appreciate the local avifauna.

tour-9.title: City Tour
tour-9.description: Discover the history and culture of Montecristi with a guided tour through its monuments and landmarks.
